THE PLEASURE OF COFFEE

HOME

The first paragraph is sensationalized content aimed at catching your attention, pushing you to at least read the second block of text.

In this paragraph, I would try and relate to your situation by citing things every living being will likely experience in their life, such as thirst, fatigue, or even chronic lack of sleep.

This is the paragraph where I'd supposedly try to reel you in, presenting coffee as a one-for-all solution to your every problem. Who doesn't love coffee anyway?
